wikipedia_page.main: Charles Hamar Delevingne (born 25 June 1949) is an English property developer and the father of daughters Cara and Poppy Delevingne. He is the son of socialite Angela Delevingne and the grandson of the lawyer and politician Hamar Greenwood, 1st Viscount Greenwood.

response: * Charles Delevingne, a British property developer

The Delevingnes had two children before the outbreak of World War II, Anne Venetia Charlotte Delevingne and Edward Hamar Delevingne. During the war, her husband served in the Royal Fusiliers in North Africa. After the war ended the couple had two more children, Charles Delevingne and Elizabeth Caroline Felicia Delevingne. They lived in London, Surrey, and Wiltshire. Her husband worked in property and real estate, helping secure Thatched House Lodge for Princess Alexandra of Kent and Angus Ogilvy and securing Sutton Place for J. Paul Getty. She was the grandmother of models Poppy Delevingne and Cara Delevingne.
